title: Understanding Panic Disorders
text: Panic disorders are a type of anxiety disorder characterized by sudden and repeated episodes of intense fear.

title: Symptoms of Panic Disorders
text: Symptoms often include palpitations, sweating, trembling, shortness of breath, and a feeling of impending doom.

hintAnswer: anxiety reaction to stress that results in a panic attack
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes panic disorders?
choices: persistent and excessive worry about everyday events and activities
persistent worry, restlessness, and physical symptoms like fatigue and muscle tension
anxiety reaction to stress that results in a panic attack
common form of $$anxiety-related$$ mental disorder wherein a person has recurring thoughts and ideas that make them uncomfortable and anxious
